about_the_game:
Mint Notes is an easy-to-use visual board app that aims to support game designers! Create and Import hundreds of cards from a table, Setup your own card game, and Share it with others by using Steam Workshop!

Features
  • Component Creation: Easily create nodes, connections, cards, and groups to organize your ideas.
  • Markdown Preview: Supports live Markdown previews for enhanced content formatting.
  • Automated Organization: Features like auto-organizing nodes and containers for grouping components.
  • High Customizability: Personalize components with colors, badges, emblems, and borders.
  • JCards: Create customizable cards with titles, labeled text fields, and input options.
  • CSV Table Import/Export: Import CSV tables into JCards, with options to override or retain original cards. Export JCards to CSV with customizable export options.
  • Card Game Mode: Use your Normal Mode cards to play a customizable card game.
  • Syncing: Keep changes in sync between Normal Mode and Card Game Mode.
  • Steam Workshop Support: Share your card games with others through Steam Workshop.
